short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transcend is an extension aimed at helping transgender people avoid gender dysphoria by replacing your deadname with your name.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will replace your deadname with your name on most webpages that you visit. This helps transgender people avoid gender dysphoria and the harmful effects that come as a result of deadnaming.
